docs.title: YOLO-Based Binary Object Sorting System
docs.text:
Welcome! This GitHub page will contain documentation regarding what this project is about as well as progress for where I am at and all developments that have occured. This will serve as a log of my progress.

Check out my engineering portfolio to see other projects!

docs.title: About Me
docs.text: My name is Sidh Gurnani, and I studied Mechanical Engineering at Purdue University, and graduated with my Bachelor's in May 2025. I have been working on this project since June 2024.

docs.title: Project Milestones + Progress
docs.text:
Here is a look at where I am at now:

Refresh Programming Knowledge Understand Basics of Machine Learning Develop Basic Software 3D Model and Design Physical Product Integrate Software and Hardware Final Testing Reflection and Next Steps
